13.bukiya ra 12ta arinawa kiyala rawayak giya.samaharu badu pak karanawa rata idan enna kiyala post danna gaththa.janadhipathithumata samahara aya ithamath karunikawa menma winithawa kiyala thibuna bukiya nawatha wiwrutha karadena lesa.me athara harin pranandu amathyawaraya madhya hamuwakadi kata konakin sinasemin kiyala thibbe mathi amathi janadhipathi buki gathawuneth pitarata di kiyala.bukiya oona da epa da ahala boho aya samikshana karanna una.epayi kiwa ayatath ithamath karunika wachanawalin samaharu jathiya amathala thibuna.me athara bukiya nidahas karaganna oona kiyana satana patan gaththa.
